name: Sprinter Monogatari: Mezase!! Ikkakusenkin
overview: Sprinter Monogatari: Mezase!! Ikkakusenkin ("Sprinter Story: Take Aim!! Instant Riches") is a cycling simulation game with racing elements. The player creates a professional cyclist and regulates their training to turn them into a champion sprint/Keirin racer. The player balances on improving their strength, tactics and endurance with their morale, taking occasional breaks.
